name: Makai Ouji: Devils and Realist: Dairiou no Hihou
overview: Makai Ouji: Devils and Realist: Treasure of the Substitute King (魔界王子 devils and realist 代理王の秘宝, Makai Ōji: Devils and Realist: Dairi-ō no hihō) is a visual novel produced by Namco Bandai Games for the Nintendo 3DS and was released on September 26, 2013. The game features an original story, with multiple endings which are determined by the player's choices.
